Our 2026 candidate page is under construction.

Check back soon for updates on Democratic candidates running for office.

## Get Involved

In the meantime, here's how you can help:

- [Volunteer](https://scdp.org/volunteer)
- [Donate](https://donate.scdp.org)

Contact us at info@scdp.org
